title: Sen. Lindsey Graham warns Iran: 'If you escalate the war, we’re coming for you'
description: The South Carolina Republican said in an interview on "Meet the Press" that he's leading a bipartisan group of senators on a trip to Saudi Arabia and Israel in the coming days.

title: Plumes of smoke rise over Gaza as Israel continues bombardment
description: The Israeli offensive continues with regular bombardment of Gaza as a ground invasion looms. Medics in Gaza warned that thousands could die if hospitals packed with wounded people run out of fuel and basic supplies.

title: Israeli tanks deploy near Lebanese border amid high tensions
description: Israeli tanks were stationed along the border with Lebanon amid rising tensions as troops prepare for a possible ground assault on the Hamas-controlled Gaza Strip. Israel has vowed to annihilate the militant group Hamas in retaliation for a rampage by its fighters in Israeli towns.

title: Israel-Hamas war live updates: Gaza gripped by humanitarian crisis as Israel readies ground attack
description: Israel-Hamas war live updates: Gaza gripped by humanitarian crisis as Israel readies ground attack
